isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 10 SPEED AND 15 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT, RTO, AND RTX SERIES - CHANGING THE INPUT SHAFT - REASSEMBLY

step1.para: If necessary, install a new bushing in the pocket of the input shaft.
Install the snap ring in the groove of the drive gear.
Install the drive gear spacer bearing on the input shaft.
Install the drive gear bearing on the input shaft.
Install the bearing retainer snap ring.
Install the front bearing cover and gasket. Make sure to align the oil return hole in the case with the hole in the cover.
To facilitate proper re-installation of the shifter housing assembly on the case, make sure the mainshaft sliding clutches are placed in the neutral position.
Reinstall the shifter housing assembly, the front bearing cover and all other parts and assemblies previously removed, making sure to replace the gaskets used.
